display_name: Apnea Hypopnea Index (Supine): (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal) / hours of sleep in supine position from type III home sleep apnea test
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
